ygData.subject: Re: Re:What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: You will quickly adapt the leather look however, it can t be avoided. By level 35 you should no trouble having these items or possible better Foreman s Tunic,
ygData.messageBody:
You will quickly adapt the leather look however, it can't be avoided.
By level 35 you should no trouble having these items or possible better

Foreman's Tunic, chest, leather look
Azure Sleeves, no appearence (should look like blue chain but oh well)
Drake-Hide Leggings, legs, leather look
Wolf-fur slippers, feet, no appearence

Azure sleeves are especially nice, you will keep your cured silk
shoulders, as clarity mentioned, until level 50 most likely.

--

Hammeron
Monk of Quellious
Karana

--
Worlord
worlord@...
